text:
FOP: Bugs and Other Trackable Issues (http://xmlgraphics.apache.org/fop/bugs.htm)
says: "Review the Apache Bug Writing Guidelines before submitting your report"
but the link referes to non-existing
http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/bugwritinghelp.html
Correct URL appears to be:
http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/page.cgi?id=bug-writing.html
creator: pzeldin@gmail.com

text:
Thanks for reporting this! Fixing it now. Should show up on the site within 6 hours.

BTW, the page is http://xmlgraphics.apache.org/fop/bugs.html (you forgot the
trailing 'l').
creator: the.webmaestro@gmail.com

text: batch transition pre-FOP1.0 resolved+fixed bugs to closed+fixed
creator: gadams@apache.org
